title: WTB:  Last 2 cards for the Monster
author: ZiggerZagger

posts.post_title: WTB:  Last 2 cards for the Monster
posts.post_content:
It's getting pretty exciting, now down to the last [STRIKE]dozen or so[/STRIKE] TWO cards for the Monster.   
Can't thank the Net54 community enough for all of the help the last few years on this project.

The set has been built from the ground up with a focus on strong Centering, in PSA 4.0 - 5.5.  
Looking for the last cards to close it out.


--Pat McCauley (SL)
--Ty Cobb (Bat Off)

[STRIKE]--Sam Crawford (w/ Bat)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Ray Demmitt (STL)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Larry Doyle (Throwing)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Kid Elberfeld (Was.)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Chick Gandil[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Dick Hoblitzell[/STRIKE][STRIKE]
--J.F. Kiernan (SL)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Ed Killian (Hands at Chest)[/STRIKE][STRIKE]
--Frank Smith (Chicago & Boston)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Jeff Sweeney (NY)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Ira Thomas[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]--Bill O'Hara (STL)[/STRIKE]

All help is appreciated!
I have this PSA 4 Hoblitzell P350. Please let me know if you're interested. Color and focus/registration better than most examples, and decent centering.

[quote name="tjb1952tjb" post=1961938]I have this PSA 4 Hoblitzell P350. Please let me know if you're interested. Color and focus/registration better than most examples, and decent centering.[/QUOTE]

Tim— interested and thanks!  Email me at address above to discuss please.
Added a handful thanks to the Board.  Still looking for the last 11.

One really big dog off the list -- Still looking for the rest.

Thanks!
Updated.  Still looking for the final Fine 9.

On the hunt for the last 7 cards.  Any help is greatly appreciated!
|

Added more -- down to the Final Five now.

--J.F. Kiernan (SL)
--Pat McCauley (SL)
